content.newsInsight: Xi's military purges just exposed China's nuclear anxiety while NYT reports peak oil forecasts are suddenly cloudy. Everyone's debating energy security. We see the real story: when nuclear powers doubt their own arsenals, oil becomes the only reliable power currency left.
content.patternInsight: You're still reading. That already puts you ahead.
content.intelligenceExample: Xi's nuclear force purges, for example. We read that and our mind goes to: if China doesn't trust its own nuclear deterrent, does that make oil reserves the new mutually assured destruction?
